desc: Project DescriptionOur company seeks an energetic and team-oriented Administrative Assistant to join its winning team of professionals. This is a great opportunity for an administrative professional to grow with a company that values training and the advancement of its employees.This list is intended only to illustrate the various types of work that may be performed. The omission of specific statements does not exclude them from the position if the work is similar, related, or a logical assignment to the position.REQUIREMENTS:1) Skype account ready for video chat2) Fluent italian and english speaking&writing. Russian is a plus for candidate.3) Telephone conversation ready (IP Phone based solution will be supplied to worker so she can call local italian numbers.)4) Computer software applications:  Microsoft Windows Word, Excel5) Excellent interpersonal communication skills & a great attitude6) Skill in following oral and written instructions7) Skill in adapting to changes in work load demandJOB DUTIES:1) provide information from established policies to owners, guests, and general public; maintain security and confidentiality.2) Provide excellent service with telephone etiquette, screen calls, respond to inquiries and/or refer callers as required.3) Process mail/email that may require attaching related correspondence or information before forwarding; identify priority and/or time sensitive matters.4) Perform required check-in/check-out process for Hotels, Flight tickets etc.5) Communicate with Housekeeping, Maintenance department, Local6) Work with and respond to various individuals, vendors, and agencies to address and resolve complaints, concerns and problems requiring a good understanding of the subject matter; research material from various sources.7) Provide information and documents requests to realtors and owners.8) Compose, draft, proofread, edit, copy, collate, and distribute documents and correspondence9) Provide assistance to owners for searching information online in italian language.Other DutiesBecause of the small size of the staff, each employee is expected to perform a wide range of office and field duties outside her/his normal representative duties, as may be required
title: Hire a Female Virtual Assistant
